subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The veil of mystery around sprinter Tyson Gay lifted for a stretch on Sunday when he declared himself pain-free after working out publicly for the first time since he was injured in early July.
snippet: The veil of mystery around sprinter Tyson Gay lifted for a stretch on Sunday when he declared himself pain-free after working out publicly for the first time since he was injured in early July.
